description.english: Complete the campaign on any difficulty
description.german: Schließe die Kampagne auf einem beliebigen Schwierigkeitsgrad ab
description.french: Terminez la campagne, peu importe la difficulté
description.italian: Completa la campagna a qualsiasi difficoltà
description.spanish: Completa la campaña en cualquier dificultad
description.schinese: 在任意难度下完成战役
description.japanese: 任意の難易度でゲームをクリアする
description.portuguese: Complete a campanha em qualquer dificuldade

description.english: Complete the campaign on hard, recruit all commanders and keep them alive
description.german: Schließe die spiel auf höchster Schwierigkeit, rekrutiere alle Kommandanten und halte sie am Leben
description.french: Terminez la campagne en difficile, recrutez tous les commandants et maintenez-les en vie
description.italian: Completa la campagna in modalità difficile, recluta tutti i comandanti e tienili in vita
description.koreana: 하드 모드의 캠페인을 완료하고, 지휘관을 모두 모집하여 한 명도 잃지 마세요.
description.spanish: Completa la campaña en el modo difícil, recluta a los comandantes y mantenlos con vida.
description.schinese: 在困难难度下完成战役，招募所有指挥官，并让他们活下来
description.tchinese: 完成困難等級的戰役，招募所有指揮官並讓他們活着
description.russian: Пройти кампанию на сложном уровне, нанять всех командиров, все командиры должны выжить
description.japanese: 全隊長を迎え入れ、かつ全員無事な状態で、難易度ハードをクリアする
description.portuguese: Complete a campanha na dificuldade mais alta, recrute todos os comandantes e mantenha-os vivos
description.turkish: Mücadeleyi zor modda bitir, tüm komutanlari al ve onlari hayatta tut

description.english: Purchase an upgrade for one of your commanders
description.german: Kaufe ein Upgrade für einen deiner Kommandeure
description.french: Achetez une amélioration pour l'un de vos commandants
description.italian: Acquista un miglioramento per uno dei tuoi comandanti
description.koreana: 지휘관 중 한 명을 위해 업그레이드를 한 개 구매하세요.
description.spanish: Adquiere una mejora para tus comandantes.
description.schinese: 为您的一名指挥官购买一项升级
description.tchinese: 為一位指揮官購買升級項目
description.russian: Приобрести улучшение для одного из своих командиров
description.japanese: 隊長1人のアップグレードを行う
description.portuguese: Compre uma melhoria para um dos seus comandantes
description.turkish: Bir komutanin için iyilestirme satin al

description.english: Fully upgrade one of your commanders
description.german: Upgrade einen deiner Kommandeure auf die höchste Stufe
description.french: Améliorez entièrement l'un de vos commandants
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i miglioramenti per uno dei tuoi comandanti
description.koreana: 지휘관 중 한 명을 완전히 업그레이드하세요.
description.spanish: Mejora completamente a uno de tus comandantes.
description.schinese: 为您的一名指挥官完全升级
description.russian: Приобрести все улучшения для одного из своих командиров
description.japanese: 隊長1人のアップグレードをすべて行う
description.portuguese: Melhore completamente um dos seus comandantes

description.english: Win an island in the snow
description.french: Remportez une île tandis qu'il neige
description.spanish: Gana una isla en la nieve.
description.japanese: 雪のある環境で勝利する

description.german: Gewinne eine Insel in der Nacht
description.french: Remportez une île tandis qu'il fait nuit
description.japanese: 夜行われる戦いで勝利する

description.english: Win 3 islands on a single turn
description.italian: Conquista 3 isole in un solo turno
description.spanish: Gana 3 islas en un solo turno.
description.schinese: 在一个回合内，赢得3座岛屿
description.tchinese: 在一個回合中征服3座島嶼
description.japanese: 1ターン中に3つの島で勝利する
description.portuguese: Vença 3 ilhas em um único turno

displayName.spanish: Dale la vuelta a la tortilla

description.english: Kill all the vikings in a ship, before it reaches the shore
description.german: Töte alle Wikinger auf einem Schiff, bevor es das Ufer erreicht
description.french: Tuez tous les Vikings d'un navire avant qu'il n'atteigne le rivage
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i vichinghi di una nave prima che giunga a riva
description.koreana: 해변에 도착하기 전에 배 안의 바이킹을 모두 해치우세요.
description.spanish: Elimina a todos los vikingos de un barco antes de que lleguen a la costa.
description.schinese: 在一船的维京人上岸前，杀死他们所有人
description.tchinese: 到岸前擊殺船上的維京人
description.russian: Убить всех викингов на корабле, пока он не достиг берега
description.japanese: 船に乗ったバイキングを岸に着く前に全員倒す
description.portuguese: Mate todos os vikings em um navio antes que ele chegue à praia
description.turkish: Bir gemideki tüm vikingleri kiyiya ulasmadan önce öldür

description.english: Win 10 islands in a row, without losing a single house
description.german: Gewinne 10 Inseln hintereinander, ohne ein einzelnes Haus zu verlieren
description.french: Remportez 10 îles d'affilée, sans perdre une seule maison
description.italian: Conquista 10 isole di fila, senza perdere una sola casa
description.koreana: 한 번도 패배하지 않고 10개의 섬을 연속으로 차지하세요.
description.spanish: Gana 10 islas consecutivas, sin perder una sola casa.
description.schinese: 在不损失一座房屋的前提下，连续赢得10座岛屿。
description.tchinese: 連續征服10座島嶼，不丟失任何房屋
description.russian: Завоевать 10 островов подряд, не потеряв ни одного дома
description.japanese: 僧院を破壊されることなく連続で10島勝利する
description.portuguese: Vença 10 ilhas em sequência sem perder um única casa
description.turkish: Tek bir ev dahi kaybetmeden, art arda 10 ada kazan
